ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And peace be upon the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So peace be on the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and peace be upon the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Peace be with the Messengers (of God).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And peace is upon the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Salam (peace!) be on the Messengers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And peace be on the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And peace be upon the Envoys;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And peace be unto those sent (to warn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And peace be Unto the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And peace be on the Messengers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And peace be upon the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:181] And peace be to the messengers, who convey from God the Message of the Oneness [of God] and [His] Laws.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And peace) from Us (be unto those sent (to warn)) because they conveyed the message.
